CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 13, 1957, page B6, reads: "Loblaws Ambassadors - Several weeks ago the top-flight cashiers, now at Loblaws' new supermarket were photographed while undergoing an intensive 'Goodwill Ambassador's course at the company's downtown training school, supervised by Mrs. Ruth Donahue, third from left."
TitMainTitle: Six women, including Sarah Haywood wearing striped shirt and Janice Finney wearing plaid suit, seated before Ruth Donahue behind desk, in interior of Loblaws Grocery Store with chalkboard and sign reading "You are Loblaws as far as the customer is concerned"
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Grocery stores--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Loblaws Grocery (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Workers--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Donahue, Ruth.Finney, Janice.Haywood, Sarah.
